attributes.additional_details:
Channel 4 has successfully for 40 years produced some of the most amazing TV series and documentaries in the UK.   Their existence has helped boost independent production companies, and its sale could result in a decline in this area as well as potential job loss.
There is no public benefit to the sale of such an asset.
attributes.background: Stop the proposed sale of Channel 4

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
